name: Summon Steward
description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

name: Purify Soul
description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

name: Soulshape
description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

name: Flicker
description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

name: Fleshcraft
description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

name: Door of Shadows
description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

name: Boon of the Ascended
description:
Draw upon the power of the Ascended for 10 sec, granting you access to <dynamic>Ascended Nova</dynamic>, replacing 

<spec>Shadow</spec>
<dynamic>Mind Flay</dynamic>

<spec>Discipline</spec><spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Smite</dynamic>

 with <dynamic>Ascended Blast</dynamic>, and increasing movement speed by 50%.

Upon expiration, releases an <dynamic>Ascended Eruption</dynamic>:

<dynamic>Explode for (150% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (200% of Spell power) healing to all allies within 15 yds, increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended.</dynamic>

name: Ascended Nova
description:
Release a powerful burst of anima, dealing (42% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (40% of Spell power) healing to all allies within 8 yds.

Grants 1 stacks of Boon of the Ascended for each target damaged.

name: Ascended Blast
description:
Blasts the enemy with pure Anima, causing (250% of Spell power) Arcane damage and healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.

Grants 5 stack of Boon of the Ascended.

$?c3[<dynamic>Generates 12 Insanity.</dynamic>]
][]

name: Ascended Eruption
description: Explode for (150% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (200% of Spell power) healing to all allies within 15 yds, increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended.

name: Fae Blessings
description:
Surround yourself with helpful sprites, causing your next 10 spell casts to aid your target depending on your chosen spell.

<spec>Discipline</spec>


<spec>Holy</spec>


<spec>Shadow</spec>

name: Unholy Nova
description:
An explosion of dark energy heals allies within 15 yds for (150% of Spell power) and infects enemies with Unholy Transfusion.

 <dynamic>Unholy Tranfusion</dynamic>
<dynamic>Deals (200% of Spell power) Shadow damage over 15 sec. Allies who damage this target are healed for (12% of Spell power).</dynamic>

name: Mindgames
description:
Assault an enemy's mind, dealing (200% of Spell power) Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality.

$?c3[For 5 sec, the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] damage they deal will heal their target, and the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] healing they deal will damage their target.

<dynamic>Reversed damage and healing generate up to 40 Insanity.</dynamic>]
][For 5 sec, the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] damage they deal will heal their target, and the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] healing they deal will damage their target.

<dynamic>Reversed damage and healing restore up to 4% mana.</dynamic>]
